mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repboard(board_no,parent_no, board_id,board_title, board_content, board_viewcount) VALUES (board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{parentNo},#{boardC.id},#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},0)
mapper.select: SELECT level,repboard.* FROM repboard START WITH parent_no=0 CONNECT BY prior board_no=parent_no ORDER SIBLINGS BY board_no desc
SELECT repboard.* FROM repboard WHERE board_title LIKE '%${word}%' OR board_content LIKE '%${word}%'
mapper.update: UPDATE repboard SET board_viewcount = board_viewcount+1 WHERE board_no=#{boardNo}
